title: Smart Data Models - WindAeroConstIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The constant aerodynamic torque model assumes that the aerodynamic torque is constant.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.1.1.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindAeroConstIEC

WindGenTurbineType1IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine type 1 model with which this wind aerodynamic model is associated. Default: None
